DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine cut-off value fetal lung volume VOCAL pulmonary artery resistance index pulse Doppler fetus diabetic mother , correlate result postnatal respiratory distress term neonate .
DOC.brief_title: Fetal Lung Volume Pulmonary Artery Resistance Index Measurement Term Diabetic Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Research question : Can assessment fetal lung volume Virtual Organ Computed-aided Analysis ( VOCAL ) pulmonary artery resistance index pulse Doppler predict neonatal respiratory distress syndrome term fetuses diabetic mother ? Research hypothesis : The assessment fetal lung volume VOCAL pulmonary artery resistance index pulse Doppler predict neonatal respiratory distress syndrome term fetuses diabetic mother .
DOC.criteria: Diabetic pregnant woman 38 week gestation admit elective termination due various obstetric indication 1 . Twins . 2 . Pregnancy complicate medical disorder Diabetes Mellitus ( hypertension , preeclampsia , cardiac disorder , thyroid disorder , anemia pregnancy ... etc ) . 3 . Autoimmune disorder . 4 . Congenital fetal anomaly . 5 . Macrosomia intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) . 6 . Intrauterine fetal death ( IUFD ) . 7 . Amniotic fluid index < 5cm > 20cm . 8 . Patients take steroid within one week measurement lung volume .
